Retrieves the Offer definitions for Offer program

param.name: rowIndex
param.doc: Row Index from which the records should be retrieved. If rowIndex is not provided and rowLimit is provided, then all offer definitions from the start upto the rowLimit will be returned.

param.name: rowLimit
param.doc: Number of records that should be retrieved starting from rowIndex. If rowIndex is provided and rowLimit is not provided, then all the offers from the rowIndex will be returned.
